com.lambdaworks.redis.protocol

Class CommandArgs.ExperimentalByteArrayCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lambdaworks.redis.codec.ByteArrayCodec
      • com.lambdaworks.redis.protocol.CommandArgs.ExperimentalByteArrayCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RedisCodec<byte[],byte[]>
    Enclosing class:
    CommandArgs<K,V>

    public static final class CommandArgs.ExperimentalByteArrayCodec
extends ByteArrayCodec
    This codec writes directly byte[] to the target buffer without wrapping it in a ByteBuffer to reduce GC pressure.
